training_data.instruction: Tell me about Computer Science Major - Computer Science Department.
training_data.response:
Option areas: Specialize your CS degree
We have updated the curriculum of both tracks to the recommendations of CS educational policymakers, represented by the [ACM](https://www.acm.org/) and [IEEE](https://www.computer.org/) professional organizations.
Option
Focus on the technical aspects of software creation. This option is accredited by
the
[Computing Accreditation Commission of ABET](https://www.abet.org/accreditation/).Option
Earn a broader degree that covers the design, development and analysis of software.
Why major in computer science at MSU?
- Study a versatile subject – Get equipped to solve problems in many high-paying
[career paths](/Major/careers.htm). Computer science also pairs well with many minors. - Find accessible course options – Don't have a background in computer science? That's okay! Several of our courses have minimal prerequisites, if any.
- Match your degree with your interests – Design a focused plan in our accredited
[computer science option](/Major/Computer-Science-Option.htm). Or, choose from courses in computer science and other subjects, like management and psychology, in the[software development option](/Major/Software-Development-Option.htm).

metadata.topic: Computer Science Major - Computer Science Department

training_data.instruction: Give me comprehensive information about Computer Science Major - Computer Science Department.
training_data.response:
Option areas: Specialize your CS degree
We have updated the curriculum of both tracks to the recommendations of CS educational policymakers, represented by the [ACM](https://www.acm.org/) and [IEEE](https://www.computer.org/) professional organizations.
Option
Focus on the technical aspects of software creation. This option is accredited by
the
[Computing Accreditation Commission of ABET](https://www.abet.org/accreditation/).Option
Earn a broader degree that covers the design, development and analysis of software.
Why major in computer science at MSU?
- Study a versatile subject – Get equipped to solve problems in many high-paying
[career paths](/Major/careers.htm). Computer science also pairs well with many minors. - Find accessible course options – Don't have a background in computer science? That's okay! Several of our courses have minimal prerequisites, if any.
- Match your degree with your interests – Design a focused plan in our accredited
[computer science option](/Major/Computer-Science-Option.htm). Or, choose from courses in computer science and other subjects, like management and psychology, in the[software development option](/Major/Software-Development-Option.htm). - Upgrade your skill-set – Gain in-demand knowledge, become
[certified in web programming](/WebProgramming/default.htm)and stay up-to-date on the latest technology trends.
Explore many aspects of this evolving field
You will study the design, development and analysis of software and hardware used to solve problems in a variety of business, scientific and social contexts.
We also collaborate with other academic departments, including biology and art. As a computer science major, you'll have enhanced, hands-on learning and the ability to look into specialty areas.
To ensure your success in the technical and problem solving areas of this field, adequate math and science skills are recommended.
Degree options
Spotlight
Creating digital dialogue
The Innovators, a group of computer science students, took first place in a national
competition held by ConocoPhillips.
Careers and outcomes
Explore the ins and outs of computer operations. Your education will lead you toward
computer engineering, robotics, digital media and more.
